timeline.bodyText: It’s probably better to change the function name in calcite sql parser to match Pinot functions. This will restrict calcite classes to parsing
timeline.author: kishoreg

replies.bodyText:
I cannot refer AdditionTransformFunction.FUNCTION_NAME in CalciteSqlParser, as CalciteSqlParser is in pinot-common module, AdditionTransformFunction is in pinot-core module.
Another option here is that I can create a PlusTransformFunction extends AdditionTransformFunction, by just overriding the function name to plus
replies.author: xiangfu0

timeline.bodyText: could we add some more queries here which will cover all the arithmetic operators?
timeline.author: npawar

timeline.bodyText:
Can we add tests for nested? e.g ADD(col1 + 5, col2), ADD(col1 * 5, col2)?
Also, expressions with parentheses?
timeline.author: siddharthteotia
